Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~sheehan Merged in master. Did you intend to cherry pick to release-1.3 for inclusion in v1.3.1? Please either cherry pick or remove v1.3.1 from FixVersion.

Action.author: sheehan
Action.body: ~denyeart - yes, I wanted to cherry pick to release-1.3 for inclusion in v1.3.1. I couldn't use the Gerrit UI to cherry pick due to a merge conflict so I had to use the CLI. Can you confirm this looks correct? https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/27111/
